name: newmd-backend
description: An api for mingdao's potato server.

scripts.dev: bun -v && bun ./app.js || nodemon -v && nodemon --trace-warnings ./app.js || node -v && node --trace-warnings ./app.js
scripts.start: pm2 start ./app.js --name newmd-backend --attach || pm2 restart newmd-backend --update-env --attach
scripts.check-and-fix-lint:
(echo '
---

Scanning for lint error...' && eslint .) || (echo '

---

Found lint error, working on it...' && eslint . --fix) || echo "

WARNING: There are some error that can't be fixed automatically!"

author: AAAA
